Class mathBattle

java.lang.Object
group33.VirtualPet.src.main.model.mathBattle
public class mathBattle extends Object
Represents a math battle system in the Virtual Pet game. Manages player and opponent health, and contains math problems for different difficulty levels (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division).

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    int[][]
    addition
    2D array of addition problems in format {a, b, c} representing a + b = c

    division
    2D array of division problems in format {a, b, c} representing a / b = c

    multiplication
    2D array of multiplication problems in format {a, b, c} representing a * b = c

    subtraction

  • Constructor Details

    • mathBattle

      public mathBattle(String level)
      Constructs a new math battle with specified difficulty level. Initializes player health to 100 and creates appropriate opponent.
      Parameters:
      level - The difficulty level ("jellyfish", "frog", "deer", or "penguin")

      Returns:

    • pLose

      public void pLose()

      Reduces opponent's health by 25 points when they lose a turn.
